benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: DELETE /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields - Remove custom fields from payment

covered: Valid Deletion scenarios covered: TC01–TC07, TC20, TC23 demonstrate removal of all fields, removal of specific fields, and behavior with legacy clients and optional headers.
Boundary and large dataset coverage: TC06 (100 fields) and TC15 (1000 fields) exercise deletion with many custom fields.
Header and authentication handling: Tests cover required header presence (various TCs), missing header (TC11), and invalid token (TC12).
Input validation and error handling: Tests for invalid paymentId format (TC08), non-existent payment (TC09), invalid customField IDs (TC13, TC18), and mixed valid/invalid inputs (TC16).
Query parameter coverage: No parameter (TC01), specific fields (TC02), extra/unexpected parameter (TC05), and legacy compatibility (TC23) scenarios are covered.
Integration and reliability: Audit-log integration (TC21, TC22) and service unavailability (TC14) are tested; performance under load (TC19) is included.
Security-focused tests: XSS attempt in header (TC17) and SQL injection in query parameter (TC18) are covered.
Response semantics: 204 No Content on successful deletions; various error responses (400, 404, 401, 503) are exercised.
gaps: Concurrency/race-condition scenarios are not covered (e.g., two clients deleting the same resource simultaneously).
403 Forbidden scenarios for insufficient permissions are not explicitly tested (only 401 for unauthorized token).
Rate limiting/throttling scenarios are not present (no 429 tests).
Caching behavior tests (ETag, Cache-Control headers) are not tested.
No explicit test for 500 Internal Server Error scenarios (only 503 for service unavailability).
Soft-delete semantics are not tested (whether fields are logically vs physically removed).
Idempotency testing for repeated DELETE calls is not present.
recommendations: Add a concurrency/race-condition test to verify safe behavior under simultaneous deletes (TC24).
Add tests for 403 Forbidden to cover insufficient permissions beyond 401.
Introduce rate-limiting/throttling tests (429) under burst load.
Add tests for caching headers (ETag/Cache-Control) to validate caching behavior.
Include tests for 500 Internal Server Error scenarios (in addition to 503).
Consider soft-delete semantics testing if applicable to the data model.
Add idempotence tests to ensure repeated DELETE calls yield consistent results.
